description: React component 'HealthBadge' that displays the health status of the backend server. It fetches the health information via 'getHealth' API call and displays a badge with the status, color-coded based on whether the backend is 'ok', 'down', or unknown.

methods.name: HealthBadge()
methods.description: React functional component that maintains and displays the backend health status badge.

ctags.name: 5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium ${color}
ctags.pattern: /^    <span className={`inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-mediu/

fields.name: <span className={`inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-mediu/
